attributes.action: Set up a committee consisting of the general public with powers to determine the future level of MP's expenses as well as the scope of what they are able to claim for.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following recent disclosures of MP's expense claims, this petition calls for the setting up of an independent committee to oversea future claims. Very few occupations allow for the individual to vote for their own pay levels, they have it set by the people who employ them. As it is the general public that 'employs' MPs through elections, it should be the general public that determines the level of pay and expenses allowed.
